General.Name: Lim Seong Hai Capital Bhd
General.Description: Lim Seong Hai Capital Berhad, an investment holding company, provides building materials in Malaysia. The company primarily offers building materials, lighting products, and related mechanical and electrical products and services. It also engages in the provision of hardware and tools; rental of machinery; and provision of construction and business-related services & solutions. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Lim Seong Hai Capital Berhad operates as a subsidiary of Lim Seong Hai Resources Sdn Bhd.
